TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChartGraphics extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement

summary.span: 提供許多轉換函式並公開 GDI+ 物件。

span.span: Provides numerous conversion functions and exposes a GDI+ object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供許多轉換函式，也會公開 GDI +物件。This class provides numerous conversion functions and also exposes a GDI+ object. 請注意，當轉譯為向量圖形 (SVG)，使用物件自訂繪圖將不會納入為 SVG 文件的一部分。Note that when rendering as Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), use of the object for custom drawing will not be included as part of the SVG document. 根據預設，注意也的函數通常會採用絕對座標。Note also that, by default, functions usually take absolute coordinates. 這個類別的轉換方法應該很有用，如果您執行繪圖作業。Therefore the conversion methods of this class should be useful if you perform drawing operations. A物件會公開在屬性類別，讓您輕鬆地執行自訂繪圖和事件。A object is exposed in the property of the class, which makes it easy to perform custom drawing in the and events. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果預設行為的任何有重大變更物件時，可能會不穩定繪製圖表影像和其相關聯的項目。If significant changes are made to the default behavior of the object, the chart image and its associated elements may be drawn erratically. 例如，定位可能會改變。For example, positioning may be altered. 強烈建議，您也熟悉 GDI + 之前的內容中對任何重大變更物件。It is highly recommended that you become well acquainted with GDI+ before you make any significant changes to the properties of the object.

span.span: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Drawing.Graphics Graphics { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Drawing.Graphics Graphics
Public Property Graphics As Graphics
public: property System::Drawing::Graphics ^ Graphics { System::Drawing::Graphics ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 GDI+ 物件，以供繪製之用。

span.span: Gets or sets a GDI+ object that can be used for drawing purposes.
A object used for drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此物件屬性來執行可使用 GDI + 來執行任何自訂繪圖。You can use this object property to perform any custom drawing that can be performed using GDI+.
